labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Clicking on one of the settings seems to do nothing, but actually shows up when closting the profile tab.
data.expected_result: the menu shouldn't open at all or open on click instead of open when closing the profile tab.
data.short_description: when clicking on a user profile, then going into mutal servers and right clicking a server makes the option menu for the server pop up, but most options are broken and will not open until you close the profile tab
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to somones menu (preferably someone with a mutual server you have admin perms in). - right click on said mutual server - click on one of the settings option (Something like server settings, Notif settings, or Privacy settings).
